metadata.title: CVE-2019-13700 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Out of bounds memory access in the gamepad API in Google Chrome prior to78.0.3904.70 allowed a remote attacker who had compromised the rendererprocess to potentially exploit heap corruption via a crafted HTML page.

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
